Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near 95th/Dan Ryan due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#24 Wentworth
#29 State
#34 South Michigan
#95 95th
#100 Jeffrey Manor Express
#103 West 103rd
#106 East 103rd
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
